meaningMnemonic: If <radical>flowers</radical> are in the <radical>sun</radical> and they receive one <radical>drop</radical> and then another <radical>drop</radical> of water, they turn into a <kanji>strawberry</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Believe it or not, a giant <kanji>strawberry</kanji> is the only cure for an <reading>itchy Go</reading>dzilla (いちご).
